byline.original: By COLIN MOYNIHAN and GRAHAM BOWLEY

abstract: Andrea Constand's aggravated indecent assault complaint against Bill Cosby is unique, not only because it has resulted in criminal charges, but because there are proliferation of conflicting documentary accounts of what happened; Cosby faces dozens of accusations by other women.
lead_paragraph: The 2004 case in which he is charged includes many documentary, albeit conflicting, accounts of what took place between Mr. Cosby and Andrea Constand.

headline.main: In Bill Cosby Case, 3 Pills, Sips of Wine and a Charge of Sexual Assault
headline.print_headline: A Unique Case, Among Dozens of Accusations Against Cosby

snippet: The 2004 case in which he is charged includes many documentary, albeit conflicting, accounts of what took place between Mr. Cosby and Andrea Constand.
